mapper.select: select pm.pm_b_no, pm.title, pm.content, pm.reg_dt, pm.view_cnt, m.memb_no mno, m.membername mname, p.pups_no pno, p.name pname, a.act_local_no ano, a.name_si asi, a.name_gu agu from gms_pickme pm inner join gms_memb m on pm.memb_no=m.memb_no inner join gms_activelocal a on pm.act_local_no=a.act_local_no inner join gms_purpose p on p.pups_no=pm.pups_no where pm.pm_b_no=#{no}

select pm.pm_b_no, pm.title, pm.content, pm.reg_dt, pm.view_cnt, pm.act_local_no, pm.pups_no, m.memb_no, m.membername from gms_pickme pm left outer join gms_memb m on r.memb_no = pm.memb_no where m.membername=#{name}
mapper.insert: insert into gms_pickme(title, content, act_local_no, pups_no, memb_no) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{activeLocal.no}, #{purpose.no}, #{member.no})
mapper.update: update gms_pickme set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, act_local_no = #{activeLocal.no}, pups_no = #{purpose.no}, memb_no = #{member.no} where pm_b_no = #{no} and memb_no = #{member.no}
update gms_pickme set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where pm_b_no = #{no}
